Make a booking

GLAMPING UNDER THE STARS

Experience quality time in a safe environment

VIEW MORE

About

SELF CATERING ACCOMMODATION IN JACOBSBAY

‘The Oasis’ as we are affectionately known, includes the self-catering, Jacobs Bay Boutique Glamping and Accommodation, the world-famous Pixie and Fairy Village, the 7 Tier West Coast Living Labyrinthe , The Plot Cafe and Tea Garden as well as the Succulent Pixie Nursery. 

The Oasis is located just 400m from the beach and is an ideal venue and Glamping Establishment for family get-togethers, weddings, corporate events, weekend and mid-week getaways. It is the perfect place to escape from concrete city life. 

Plenty of private areas and hideaway spots with their own fireplaces are scattered around the lush gardens of the Oasis  under The Oasis treetop canopy accommodating groups, couples on a romantic break away, families or singles. Communal Kitchen available for guests. 

The Pixie and Fairy Village is a sight and experience that touches you deeply. It portrays the life and adventures of Mama Pixie. The Pixie Shop offers trinkets, curios, chocolates, cooldrinks, fairies, pixies, Vintage Clothing, dreamcatchers, and kiddies’ toys. The Succulent Pixie Nursery sells a wide variety of cacti, succulents, native plants, and rock art. Gift vouchers are also for sale and makes the perfect present.

The new 7 Tier West Coast Living Labyrinthe is free for visitors to walk and enjoy.

As you enter, against the quiet spot, you will find a pile of white stones and rocks, pick up a stone and while walking carry it with you, focusing any negative thoughts and energies onto and into the rock. Place it somewhere in the Labyrinthe while releasing your body and mind from all negativities.  Over time the flowers and plants will grow around your rock and your contribution will enable the Living Labyrinthe to grow, cleansing all negative energies and adding you as an artist and co-creator of a Unique spiritual place enabling good karma.

Jacobsbaai Boutique Glamping & Accommodation

Accommodation at the Oasis includes double rooms, dorms, an A-Frame glamping tent with an ensuite, ensuite three-sleeper stone cottage, camping sites and A-Frame camping tents. We are committed to providing self-catering accommodation in Jacobsbaai at affordable prices. Established in the 1990s, Jacobsbaai is known today as the ‘Oyster of the West Coast’. It is famous for the West Coast Bioreserve, seafood, flora and fauna, the white stone houses and 5 tranquil bays, and The World Class Pixie and Fairy Village.

WHAT WE OFFER AT JACOBSBAY BOUTIQUE GLAMPING AND ACCOMMODATION

Wifi

Shower

Braai areas and firepits

Fishing

Beach

A self-service bar

Games room with big screen TV for sport

Venue for Children's Parties

Camping Kitchenette

Nursery

Self-service Kitchen

Pixie Cafe

Camping site

Surfing at Swartriet 2.5 2.4km

Birdwatching (Resident golden weaver colony on site)

Succulent Nursery

7 Tier West coast living labyrinthe(Dogs welcome)

Plunge pool for hot summer days(extra fee)

Game viewing(Duiker Klipspringer, mongoose, foxes etc)

Book your stay in Jacobsbaai Boutique Glamping & Accommodation

Close Proximity

  • Mykonos Casino 25km 
  • Langebaan and the Lagoon (Fishing)
  • (City of the West Coast)
  • Saldanha Bay and harbor (Fishing)
  • Hopefield Polkadraai Farmstall
  • Hopefield Fossil Park
  • Bergriver (Fishing)
  • (Port Owen, Veldrift,Laaipek,Bokkom Laan)
  • Paternoster ( Crayfish)
  • St.Helena Bay ( Fresh Snoek)
  • Buffelsfontein Private Game Resverve.
  • West Coast Mall 11km
